@JuggernautOfWar If your PS3 is on a higher Firmware then 3.55 then you cant install a Custom firmware.  If your ps3 is a older model about 2 years ago but with a updated firmware then you need to buy a E3 flasher for about $80 to downgrade from the official Firmware down to 3.55, then to a CFW.
